data.name: Jewellery catalog application
data.description: DLJewels is a jewellery catalog application I built for my client which came out well as expected. Initially it was built to include just the application's catalog, later linked with a CDN to deliver and update images. I was the one who designed, architected and implemented the entire application

data.name: Maa Properties
data.description: It is one of my first projects, developed for a client's business. In short, this is a tenancy management portal. Means, it eases the tenant-owner transactions. Though started with a minimum viable product, later on it's scope has been expanded to include features like complaints section, service request notifications, paymemts tracker, multi-level access control and much more. It is one of my key client deliverables

data.name: Expense sharing app - Roomies
data.description: A problem turned into product. It is an expense sharing application I built for using among my flat mates. It contains some routine, yet, fully functional features including - smart expense spliting, DND mode, report generation at month-end. Currently planning to roll it out once the planned features are completed along with re-development in React

data.name: True Leaf Tech
data.description: Built for a client in UAE, True Leaf Tech, it is a Hybrid web application built with React and wrapped up with Android SDK using ionic-capacitor. With advent of ionic into react with ionic-4, it has got some good support from built-in ionic UI features. It's nothing less to any native Android app

data.name: Bricks and More
data.description: A construction supply chain management application built in Angular 6, for a local business. Though it contains some featues like offline registration, statement generation, admin panel etc, the one I liked than the rest is the order creation module, which contains live order status tracking system

data.name: Streaming Site
data.description: One of my product ideas which is inspired from ICECAST streaming platform, is a streaming site, where anyone can stream their music, be it a song or a podcast. It's like a radio station in a pocket. Whoever subscribes to your channel, starts listening to your broadcasts right away on opening. It makes use of Socket programming and is still a work in progress

data.name: Shopping Cart
data.description: Shopping Cart widget based on React and localStorage

data.name: Custom Calendar Widget
data.description: Custom Calendar widget built in JavaScript with Weekly and Monthly views. It was a part of a coding exercise in a hackathon. Quick and made out of coreJS date functions

data.name: CountItDown npm package
data.description: Another npm package to plugin in the count-down-timer in your webapplication. Built using date-fns library, you pass the finish date/time to the component, it returns the count-down timer widget in action in your plugged in component

data.name: Stock Scrape
data.description: Scraping some stock exchange site (strictly for non-commercial purposes), I made this tool just to get the trade options - puts and calls, and without much hassle and calculation, this returns the calculated data on to a excel sheet. Thanks to Python's BEAUTIFUL SOUP library, It's a first and most useful library one must be aware when web-scraping
